hackathon-description-text: WiCHacks is an all-women, 24-hour hackathon hosted by Women in Computing at RIT. A
hackathon-eligibility: All attendees must be female students currently enrolled at a college/university or high school.
hackathon-rules:
1) All hacks must be started AFTER hacking begins.
2) Any software or hardware from a third party MUST also be publicly available to use by anybody else.
3) Do NOT steal anyone else's source code.
4) Judges make the final decision on any winner of a prize.
5) Have fun, learn something, and make something awesome!

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Solar Powered Chargers + Bluetooth Shower Speakers
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Women and Gender Issue Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Tile Mates for each team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Web and Mobile Hack - Intuit

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $100 Amazon Gift Card per team member
Nintendo 2D's with Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time
$250 Wegmans Gift Card per team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Google Cloud Platform
Best Hack For Social Good - JP Morgan
